short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a context menu option to selected text and search in ETI webpage by this text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With ETI Search you can search for ETI products from any website in etigroup.eu, without having to copy and paste the search term. Simply select the desired text, e.g. product code and right-click on the new entry in your browser's context menu.

The search results will open in a new tab, if the search term is a code of eti product you will be automatically transfered to page of that product. If the search term is not a code you will be transfered to our search engine on etigroup.eu where you can find the product you were looking for.
